full_summary:
**NPP TBIPS Peoplesoft Professional Services**
================================================

**Procurement Reference:** `cb-843-65928884`

**Amendment 4**

**Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP) number:** `01B68-23-0205`

**Bid Closing Date:** Tuesday, February 20, 2024 at 2:00 PM

**Notice Published Date:** January 31, 2024

### Tender Description

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the provision of Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) to maintain and upgrade its PeopleSoft application.

The successful contractor will provide access to consultant resources with subject matter expertise in HR and Payroll to support the upgrade project requirements. The services will be used to support AAFC's operational activities and provide expertise to manage risk, augment internal capacity, and support the next generation of Human Resources and Payroll systems.

### Security Requirements

* Described under Common PS SRCL #19
* Minimum Corporate Security Required: Designated Organization Screening (DOS)
* Minimum Resource Security Required: Secret and Reliability

### Contact Information

* Name: Kyle Harrington
* Title: Contracting Authority
* Email: [kyle.harrington@agr.gc.ca](mailto:kyle.harrington@agr.gc.ca)
* Phone: 555-555-5555
* Postal Address:
  1305 Baseline Road
  Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0C5

### Tender Documents

* English documents available at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/30887/01b68-23-0205-npp-tbips-english.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/30887/01b68-23-0205-npp-tbips-english.pdf)
* French documents available at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/30887/npp-%28french-23-0205.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/30887/npp-%28french-23-0205.pdf)

### Evaluation Criteria

Evaluation will be based on a combination of Technical Merit and Price. Bidders must demonstrate relevant experience, expertise, and a clear understanding of
